solutions: Check whether undefined attributes or methods are used in the hvigorconfig.ts and hvigorfile.ts files.
Go to the official website for help

JS_HEAP_OUT_OF_MEMORY.message: Worker terminated due to reaching memory limit: JS heap out of memory
solutions: Adjust the configuration related to the number of work threads: hvigor.pool.maxSiz, ohos.arkCompile.maxSize and hvigor.enableMemoryCache in hvigor-config.json5
